channel.title: Zaradomin-scape v2
channel.description:
Base:Czar(allstarscape)
[size=14pt]IF YOU DON"T LIKE IT YOU CAN USE TO LEARN A COUPLE THINGS OFF OF IT, MAYBE..............[/size]
If you are here to flame,then flame to your hearts content and see how much time you wasted trying to flame :D
[u][b]DOWNLOAD[/b][/u] http://uppit.com/v/MXRXCOAR
[u][b]Features[/b][/u] Demon Caves All of v1 features client dungeon lessened the emotes tab teleports Dragon Claws-90% Removed Jewel Retrieval quest and added starting slayer to make it like ancients Max Stat is 200 Blocks Syipkerpker(only 1 connection) set home at varrock
and it is incomplete...................................
Here are some pictures
knock yourself out if your here to flame might as well be a field day for you flamer
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/Stuff2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/Stuff1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/Stuff3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/dlprogress859.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/dlprogress857.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/dlprogress858.jpg[/img]
Enjoy!
Note: Replace the AutoSpawn.cfg if you want to see the cat selling guy Link: http://uppit.com/v/CO47O1SZ
if you talk to some npc talk glitchy go to class20.java and remove the bandos walk and stuff if you're using !client!(in the source)

item.title: Zaradomin-scape v2
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

A regular server release, with the usual two monster add in & client pictures. You changed a few textures around & people think its different. This isn’t directed at you but for once I wish people were creative. Personally I would rather this section be like the tutorial section, approved & unapproved.

@Creator; Next time you make a server source, use something like Devolution (Final 2.7, 1.1):

Devolution - Taking Over Delta… * http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425057.msg3121701.html
Devolution 1.1 [CLEAN] * http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428130.msg3143605.html
Devolution 1.1.4 * http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429632.msg3154468.html
Final Devolution 2.7 * http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,391699.msg2916767.html

You seem creative, hope you continue learning. Good work.

Read full topic
